channel.title: [667] Some pouches work, others don't?
channel.description:
The title says it all.
For example, if I spawn a Fire Titan pouch, and click summon, it will work. The problem is, if I spawn a Geyser Titan pouch, and click summon, nothing happens?
I'm looking for the problem identification, not the fix, I suppose I could fix it myself.
Please, and Thank-you
EDIT: If you need me to post any classes of methods, I will.

item.title: [667] Some pouches work, others don't?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

[quote=“mrx dodian, post:3, topic:463876”]Search for this in summoning.java

Under that add and EDIT this

These are the variables in corresponding order, Eg 7344 =NpcId

private int npcId; private int pouchId; private int level; private int spawnCost; private double useExp; private double creationExp; private int configId; private long time; private int scrollId;

If you still can’t figure it out I’ll add a already done code in the morning Its 1am.[/quote]

The problem is, I have all of those added for every monster. just some of the pouches are not working.

Read full topic

item.title: [667] Some pouches work, others don't?

Search for this in summoning.java

Under that add and EDIT this

These are the variables in corresponding order, Eg 7344 =NpcId

private int npcId; private int pouchId; private int level; private int spawnCost; private double useExp; private double creationExp; private int configId; private long time; private int scrollId;

If you still can’t figure it out I’ll add a already done code in the morning Its 1am.

Read full topic

item.title: [667] Some pouches work, others don't?
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

It probably wasn’t even implemented. If it’s not your own, then the original owner probably only worked on a few of them so that other people actually do some of the work for themselves. Just look for the ones that do work and change it up a bit for the ones that don’t. You’ll need some item ID’s, NPC ID’s and probably gfx, sound and animation ID’s too.

Read full topic
